testFiles.description: Specify glob expressions to test files to run. Defaults to ["{**/@(test|tests|__test__|__tests__)/**,**/*.@(test|tests|spec)}.@(cjs|mjs|js|jsx|ts|tsx)"]

nodeArgs.description: Specify additional node arguments to be passed when running your test files. Note that stryker will always pass an additional `--require` flag to enable coverage analysis.
